name: UpGolf!
description:
UpGolf takes golf to new heights..

Take golf to the next level (..literally!) with this fantastic new take on the classic, ever-exciting game of golf! Bringing golf upwards only enhances the experience and brings new thrills to players of all ages. With its easy to understand but difficult to master gameplay, UpGolf! is sure to keep you occupied and entertained for a good while. Enjoy!

UpGolf! is a game developed by Callum Carr, submitted for the A Game By Its Cover Jam, 2019!

This game was inspired by art created for the Famicase Exhibiton 2019 by Sam B-b. The artwork can be viewed here: https://famicase.com/19/softs/018.html
